RegulatoryAuthority.name: RegulatoryAuthority
RegulatoryAuthority.description: Represents an organization or government agency that provides authorization. This object is available in API version 49.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when a user most recently viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when a user most recently viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The unique name of the regulatory authority.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.
